title: 有的Select下拉选在展开时 有明文字显抖动现象 （尤其是带搜索功能时）
body:
### Version
3.3.0

### Environment
win10 chrome64.0.3282.186

### Reproduction link
[http://new-issue.ant.design/](http://new-issue.ant.design/)

### Steps to reproduce
点击antd下拉选， 展开下拉菜单时再现 （不是所有都会），比如这个提issue页面的头两个下拉选。 
TreeSelect 带搜索，有一层子级时问题特别明显。
带搜索框及选项多的时候也很明显。

### What is expected?
正常稳定的展开

### What is actually happening?
展开时发生文字抖动

---
虽然不影响正常使用，但感觉展开时整个下拉选都在抖动，很不舒服，希望能够解决。

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Right-side Sider Trigger
body:
### What problem does this feature solve?
Enables a collapsible sider for the right side.

Currently, if the sider is on the right hand side of the screen, the trigger is positioned as if the sider was on the left hand side:

https://codesandbox.io/s/73j86r15x0

### What does the proposed API look like?
```
<Sider
  collapseRight
</Sider>
```

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Fix <Switch /> small margin
body:
This should be 13px. Size of the circle (12px) + spacing to match the left size(1px).
https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/switch/style/index.less#L110

**Issue using current value of -12.5px:**
![screen shot 2018-03-09 at 2 26 22 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/940022/37226403-c95c109c-23a7-11e8-91bf-65ff914bbe92.png)

**Issue solved:**
![screen shot 2018-03-09 at 2 26 17 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/940022/37226410-cf48957a-23a7-11e8-8a4a-3ec5c52e79ce.png)

* [x] branch master
* [x] Make sure that you follow antd's [code convention](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/wiki/Code-convention-for-antd).
* [x] Run `npm run lint` and fix those errors before submitting in order to keep consistent code style.
* [x] Rebase before creating a PR to keep commit history clear.
* [x] Add some descriptions and refer relative issues for you PR.

title: fixed modal content overflowed
Feature require Time Range Picker feature
body:
### What problem does this feature solve?
Hi,
First of all, the framework is awesome!

But, I am facing a feature which doesn't implement by ANTD

This issue could relate this:
https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues/8584

But the feature is still not implemented yet in 3.x ANTD.

### What does the proposed API look like?
```javascript
const RangePicker = TimePicker.RangePicker
...
<RangePicker />
```
Just allows users to pick time range rather than date first then time range.

![screen shot 2018-03-08 at 4 45 25 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1507950/37178475-9c86e78e-22f0-11e8-9cb7-96379b657463.png)

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Tooltip does not disappear when button is disabled
body:
### Version
3.2.3

### Environment
Chrome

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/64zprz4vmn](https://codesandbox.io/s/64zprz4vmn)

### Steps to reproduce
Pass the mouse over the button, and then take it out without passing it over the tooltip

### What is expected?
The tooltip should disappear

### What is actually happening?
the tooltip stays opened

---
I'm using styled-components to make styles for my components, I'm creating a custom styled components from an antd Button. The problem is that when this button is disabled and I hover over the button the tooltip does not go away. The issue is related to this specific line: https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/tooltip/index.tsx#L121 , here you cant identify that is an antd Button or a coomon button because we are using styled component.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Keep the multiple select filtered?
body:
### What problem does this feature solve?
multiple mode 的select， 在选中筛选出的一个选项后， 会自动清除筛选值， 然后选项也被变成未筛选的全部选项， 如果想要选择多个的话， 就需要重新输入筛选值， 这样会很麻烦，希望能保持筛选状态， 最好是给一个配置项， 因为我在以前的issue里发现有些人是需要自动清除的功能的。

### What does the proposed API look like?
<Select
   mode="multiple"
   autoClearInputValue={false}
>
</Select>

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Use a less variable to set border-bottom-width in menu-item selected, hover, active and open
body:
### What problem does this feature solve?
Have the capability to change it from the actual 2px

### What does the proposed API look like?
In https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/menu/style/index.less#L279 you have `border-bottom: 2px solid @menu-highlight-color;` you can change it to `border-bottom: @menu-highlight-border-width solid @menu-highlight-color;` and then add the variable in https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/style/themes/default.less

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Table: Can set more detail rowSelection in Table?
body:
### What problem does this feature solve?
Currently, the Table allows users to create "rowSelection".
But, the original features don't allow users to do more detail setting on the rowSelection.

For example, on the rowSelection, it cannot set "Title" in the header. Secondly, it cannot set the order on the Table.


### What does the proposed API look like?
```javascript 
rowSelection:{{Title:"Primary", order:3}}
```

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Cannot use custom child event inside a Select
body:
### Version
3.2.1

### Environment
Windows 7, Chrome 64, Internet Explorer 11

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/n5oq82m1pj](https://codesandbox.io/s/n5oq82m1pj)

### Steps to reproduce
Create a custom component displaying a modal on click.
Wrap this component inside a Select>Option

### What is expected?
Input fields should accept focus and user inputs

### What is actually happening?
Input can be focus, but no user input are accepted

title: Day stays selected (blue) when changing month without selecting a day
body:
### Version
3.2.3

### Environment
all

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/0xp0jyy010](https://codesandbox.io/s/0xp0jyy010)

### Steps to reproduce
navigate from year to year or month to month, there is always a date "selected" in blue, but it is not selected (date has not changed)

### What is expected?
the date in blue is only the one which is selected "ie, when you click on it"
if you select the 1st on January and then go to February, the 1st of february should not be blue as date has not changed.

### What is actually happening?
if you select the 1st on January and then go to February, the 1st of february is blue, but date has not changed.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Autocomplete onSelect second param (option) does not return the Option instance children correctly
body:
### Version
3.2.2

### Environment
macOs Heigh Sierra 10.13.1, Chrome 64

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/74ywrqlvm6](https://codesandbox.io/s/74ywrqlvm6)

### Steps to reproduce
And an Option which has as a child some React component. Go select the option with the component and console log the second parameter, which is option, within the onSelect method. It return an instance of Option which has props - "value" and "children" and both of them have the same value - the value string.

### What is expected?
To return reference to its children ( the component you pass as a children to Option)

### What is actually happening?
It return the value string. 

---
Before version 3, onSelect second param - option, used to return an instance of Option with all additional props that you pass to the Option component. It seems this is not the case any more and it only returns "value" and "children" props. So now there is no option to pass some additional param and get them in the onSelect. At least if we get correctly the children when we can have these additional props passed to them.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: InputNumber: Issue with entering negative numbers when value prop is bound
body:
### Version
3.2.2

### Environment
windows 7, chrome 57.0.2987.133 64.0.3282.167

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/4xj4jpl787](https://codesandbox.io/s/4xj4jpl787)

### Steps to reproduce
Try and type '-0.04' into the inputnumber labelled as bound & broken.

### What is expected?
It should retain the value of '-0' as you type it in, allowing the user to type in '-0.04'.

### What is actually happening?
As soon as the '0' is entered, the minus sign is lost. So if the user keeps typing they incorrectly get '0.04'

---
This only occurs when the value property of the inputnumber is defined. It works fine in the other unbound InputNumber in the reproduction.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: 谷歌浏览器下使用微软输入法InputNumber控件设置千分位formatter后无法连续输入数字问题
body:
### Version
undefined

### Environment
操作系统：win10 ；浏览器：谷歌浏览器（63.0.3239.132 64位）；输入法： 微软输入法；antd版本号：2.13.10

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/anon/pen/rJqMgN?&editors=001#anon-signup](https://codepen.io/anon/pen/rJqMgN?&editors=001#anon-signup)

### Steps to reproduce
1.使用微软输入法并切换为半角中文模式，在提供的重现链接的网页下面的千分位输入控件框中输入数字。


### What is expected?
会产生由于控件千分号格式化导致连续输入数字后光标不会永远停留在最后的问题。
直接影响为无法连续输入数字，需要在添加千分位后手动移动光标后继续输入。

### What is actually happening?
输入完数字自动添加千分号后，光标依旧停留在输入框数字的最后，确保可以连续输入数字，不用手动切换光标。

---
重现BUG需要特定的场景：
此BUG只在谷歌浏览中存在，IE，EDGE，火狐并不存在此问题。
此BUG仅在输入法为微软输入法中文输入环境下产生，搜狗输入法不存在此问题。

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Pills tabs
body:

My interface already contains tabs, I would like to use nested tabs as pills view

title: Remove global Styles
body:
### Version
3.2.1

### Environment
Any

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/jnw46698m3](https://codesandbox.io/s/jnw46698m3)

### Steps to reproduce
1- Import an antd component
2- Observe global styles (h1,h6, selector, ect...)

### What is expected?
Component style to be scoped and not affect the rest of the application.

### What is actually happening?
When component is imported the entire HTML application (even outside of React) is styled.

---
This is a response to issue #9362 & #4331

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

I followed your example https://ant.design/components/anchor/
and while i got the scroll to work when i click, it doesn't have the behavior where the blue dot follows as you scroll manually

as you scroll down, blue dot follows as seen in the behavior of the example

### What is actually happening?

title: Clear Autocomplete after form submit
body:
### Version
3.1.6

### Environment
Mac 10.12.6

### Reproduction link
https://codesandbox.io/s/qpo488rzw

### Steps to reproduce
I have a form, one of formItem is AutoComplete(children is Input). I set a fixed value in dataSource at first, i want to clear Autocomplete value which is not in  search list after form submit  with resetFields. But when i clear it, the Autocomplete search list is show.
(if the value which is in search list, the search list is not show after resetField, i want it !)

for example, you can input "qwertyu" and click test

### What is expected?
when i clear Autocomplete value which is not in search list, the search list is hide.


### What is actually happening?
when i clear Autocomplete value which is not in search list, the search list is show.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Popover inside Table with Fixed Column closes on any click inside the Popover
body:
### Version
3.2.0

### Environment
OSX El Capitan, Chrome 63

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/ovojjom279](https://codesandbox.io/s/ovojjom279)

### Steps to reproduce
Create a Table and put a button in a column header that is `fixed: left` to open a Popover.  Now open the Popover and click inside it.

### What is expected?
The Popover should remain open.  This is what currently happens if you remove `fixed: left` from the column

### What is actually happening?
The Popover closes

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: TreeNode doesn't collapse when removed from "expandedKeys" props if one of the child TreeNodes of the expanded TreeNode is also expanded.
body:
### Version
3.1.6

### Environment
Mac OSX, tested on latest versions of Chrome and Safari

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/8lwlkrzl9](https://codesandbox.io/s/8lwlkrzl9)

### Steps to reproduce
Create a nested Tree with "expandedKeys" prop set to a "this.state.expandedKeys" and a "onExpanded" props that takes "expandedKeys" as an arguments and the sets the "this.state.expandedKeys" to that value.

### What is expected?
When you remove a "parent" TreeNode from "expandedKeys", with other TreeNodes nested inside of it expanded,  it should collapse.

### What is actually happening?
The "parent" TreeNode does not collapse even though it is remove from the "expandedKeys".

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Table固定列模式下，使用受控的Popconfirm出现问题
body:
### Version
3.1.6

### Environment
chrome

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/fayhy/pen/pajoeL](https://codepen.io/fayhy/pen/pajoeL)

### Steps to reproduce
调整至出现可以出现横向滚动条的大小，点击action

### What is expected?
固定列处，展示一个Popconfirm

### What is actually happening?
出现两个Popconfirm
- 一个在固定列上（ant-table-fixed-right 区域）
- 一个在滚动列上（ant-table-scroll区域）

---
在需要手动控制visible的前提下  
固定列 render，是否有办法区分 render 在 ant-table-fixed-right 区域还是 ant-table-scroll？  
以便于render控制visible属性
